Caption: Figure 5: Tracking results of the Pedestrian sequence. Frames 3, 17, 31, 45, 60 and 78 are displayed.
Mention:
In the third sequence Pedestrian, the size of the pedestrian changes between frames. We
apply the mean-shift tracking with the translation plus scaling to the sequence and the
results are shown in Figure 5. The positions and the size of the pedestrian are correctly
recovered by our algorithm.
